mapper.select: select tmp.serverSum as serverSum, tmp.windowsSum as windowsSum, tmp.linuxSum as linuxSum, tmp.serverSum - tmp.windowsSum - tmp.linuxSum as otherSum from ( select count(1) as serverSum, ifnull(sum(if(locate('Windows', mso.OS_NAME) or locate('windows', mso.OS_NAME), 1, 0)), 0) as windowsSum, ifnull(sum(if(locate('Linux', mso.OS_NAME) or locate('linux', mso.OS_NAME), 1, 0)), 0) as linuxSum from monitor_server_os mso) tmp
